Class Summary
Bar  
DataManager A wrapper containing all data
with some helper functions to query both types
Everything here is handled by StorageManager to save to file
Remember to add transient if the data is not meant to be persistent
DataManager.CombinedRecordsQueryHandler  
Report A class to hold report information
ReportCategory A data structure representing rows for the Expense table in the report
ReportGenerator Generate a Report Object given a date range
Storable Implements basic function to inspect whether data is updated
StorageManager Manages storage of all persistent data
SummaryDetails Data structure containing information on Summary during a specific time range
SummaryGenerator Generate SummaryDetails objects for 4 time frames: today, this month, this year, all time
Target This class holds information of a Target
